Sipna College of Enginnering And Technology, Amravati

Event Name : Design Your T-Shirt

Date and Time : 8th February 2024

Location : Sipna College of Engineering And Technology, Amravati

Event Fees :

300/- per team (max 2 participants)

Prize :

  • • Winner : ₹3000
  • • Runner Up : ₹2000

Judging :

• Creativity     • Flow of Design
• Visual Impact     • Color Scheme
• Quality of Application     • Effective conveying of theme message

Theme :

  • 1) Mandala
  • 2) Anime/Pop Art
  • 3) Spirituality

Coordinators :

  • 1) Hussain Jamnagarwala : 7249378181
  • 2) Kadambari Tetu : 9356954105
  • 3) Sarthak Bhor : 9665070373

Rules & Regulations

  • 1. Participants shall bring their own materials like fabric or acrylic paints, glitters, brushes, mixing plate, pencil, pen, eraser.
  • 2. White - T-shirts will be provided.
  • 3. Use of any other materials or ready-made stickers is strictly NOT ALLOWED.
  • 4. Participants shall not be allowed to use any photographs for reference.
  • 5. Mobile phones or any other electronic devices shall not be allowed during the competition.
  • 6. Any sort of tracing or copying is not allowed.
  • 7. The art work should be relevant to the theme mentioned.
  • 8. Duration of the competition will be of 2 hours.
  • 9. Decision of the judges will be final and abiding.
  • 10. After Jury you can take away your t-shirt.
  • 11. Bring your college ID Cards and Receipt on event day.
  • 12. All the participants will be awarded with "Participation Certificates ".
